thread.title: BRIEF-Median Technologies receives Notice of Allowance of the USPTO, strengthens IP portfolio
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Median Technologies receives Notice of Allowance of the USPTO, strengthens IP portfolio | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Median Technologies receives Notice of Allowance of the USPTO, strengthens IP portfolio
text:
Sept 10 Median Technologies SA :
* Median Technologies announces notice of allowance of United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) for patent application covering a set of image processing algorithms
* This adds to the IP portfolio with US patent US 9092691 B1
Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
